thread.section_title: Evermine Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Evermine | evermine.com | 2 of 517
thread.title: Harveen

author: Harveen
title: Harveen
text:
I used Evermine to create coasters for my boss's bridal shower, tags for 100 flip flops at her wedding reception, and coasters for her wedding reception. Evermine has a great selection, provides plenty of creative flexibility, and has amazing customer service!
For one of my orders, I accidentally forgot to change the color before completing my order. In addition, I had selected "ready to print" for it to be sent "straight to the printer" with no "designer review." On top of that, I had selected "super rush" for processing and shipping. I immediately sent an email to customer service, after trying to call. A representative got back to me the next day to say that they changed the color of my order and that it was on its way!
